00029 #include <algorithm>

00032 #include "Exception.hpp"

00034 CellPropertyRegistry* CellPropertyRegistry::mpInstance = NULL;
00035 
00036 CellPropertyRegistry* CellPropertyRegistry::Instance()
00037 {
00038     if (mpInstance == NULL)
00039     {
00040         mpInstance = new CellPropertyRegistry;
00041     }
00042     return mpInstance;
00043 }
00044 
00045 const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> >& CellPropertyRegistry::rGetAllCellProperties()
00046 {
00047     return mCellProperties;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void CellPropertyRegistry::Clear()
00051 {
00052     mCellProperties.clear();
00053     mOrderingHasBeenSpecified = false;
00054 }
00055 
00056 CellPropertyRegistry::CellPropertyRegistry()
00057     : mOrderingHasBeenSpecified(false)
00058 {
00059 }
00060 
00061 CellPropertyRegistry* CellPropertyRegistry::TakeOwnership()
00062 {
00063     mpInstance = NULL;
00064     return this;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void CellPropertyRegistry::SpecifyOrdering(const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> >& rOrdering)
00068 {
00069     if (mOrderingHasBeenSpecified)
00070     {
00071         EXCEPTION("An ordering has already been specified.");
00072     }
00073 
00074     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> > temp_vector = rOrdering;
00075     for (unsigned i=0; i<mCellProperties.size(); i++)
00076     {
00077         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> >::const_iterator it
00078             = find(rOrdering.begin(), rOrdering.end(), mCellProperties[i]);
00079         if (it == rOrdering.end())
00080         {
00081             temp_vector.push_back(mCellProperties[i]);
00082         }
00083     }
00084     mCellProperties = temp_vector;
00085 
00086     mOrderingHasBeenSpecified = true;
00087 }
00088 
00089 bool CellPropertyRegistry::HasOrderingBeenSpecified()
00090 {
00091     return mOrderingHasBeenSpecified;
00092 }
